name: Hexa: Block Triangle Puzzle
description:
Hexa : Block triangle puzzle gameplay is simple - on a hexagon board, drop triangle blocks of different shapes in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally.

Hexa : Block triangle puzzle is a simple and stress relieving yet addictive game that challenges your brain.Easy to play games for all ages. Completing a line can be relaxing, but also improve your logical thinking!

Game Feature:
* BLOCK MATCH PUZZLE
Merge, match, stack triangle block in a column or row in a hexagon grid. Easy to play hard to master game
